column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A man decided to jump off a building in an attempt to kill himself but suffered two broken legs at 22:30 pm on July 30
column4: 2019 at a construction site in Trapeang Thleung Village 1
column6: Por Senchey District.------The victim was identified as 32-year-old Lim Thorn
column9: the victim got into an argument with his wife
column10: and the wife left home with their children.------The husband sat alone drinking until the time he decided to go up to the second floor
column12: to jump down and attempt suicide
column13: causing fractures to both legs.------Authorities arrived at the scene and he was taken away by ambulance.------ Arey
